shapes.option

Class SquareOption

  • java.lang.Object
    • shapes.option.SquareOption

  • public class SquareOption
extends java.lang.Object
    SquareOption class: provides options for Square: every method copies source
    Square object and performs some operation
    See also: Square

      • scaleTransform

        public static Square scaleTransform(Square pSquare,
                                    double pScale)
                             throws ShapeException
        copies pSquare object and perform scale transform for it
        Parameters:
        pSquare - source Square object
        pScale - double value of scale
        Returns:
        scale transformed Square
        Throws:
        ShapeException - when pSquare == null or pScale is less or equal 0

                                     double pAngle)
                              throws ShapeException
        copies pSquare object and perform angle transform for it
        Parameters:
        pSquare - source Square object
        pAngle - double value of angle transform
        Returns:
        angle transform Square
        Throws:
        ShapeException - when pSquare == null

                                 java.awt.Color pColor)
                          throws ShapeException
        copies pSquare object and perform color changing
        Parameters:
        pSquare - source Square object
        pColor - new Color value
        Returns:
        Square with changed color
        Throws:
        ShapeException - when pSquare == null
